name: Space Golf (Fanfu)
description:
Controls:
  • Hold and release mouse left button to hit the ball.
  • Click mouse middle button or press M to open map.
  • Get the ball into the hole using the fewest hits!
Credits:
  • Made by Fanfu Shentu and Zakary Cook
  • Ambient sound from Vilkas Sound
  • UI icons from https://game-icons.net
